snippet: Since 2006, Tullow Oil has made major discoveries by exploring small oil fields in regions that larger companies have missed.
abstract: Tullow Oil continues to have success with a strategy of exploring small oil fields and making big discoveries in regions larger companies ignore; its success in Kenya could mean Tullow will have been instrumental in opening up no fewer than four new oil basins in the past six years; London-based company has grown into an exploration juggernaut with operations in more than 20 countries around the world.
lead_paragraph: Since 2006, Tullow Oil has made major discoveries by exploring small oil fields in regions that larger companies have missed.

headline.seo: Tullow Oil Finds Success Exploring Where Others Don’t
headline.main: Finding Success on the Oil Frontier
headline.print_headline: Finding Success on the Oil Frontier
